messages.message: Promise returned in function argument where a void return was expected.
Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: Unsafe assignment of an `any` value.
Unsafe member access .body on an `any` value.
Unsafe argument of type `any` assigned to a parameter of type `string`.
Unsafe argument of type `any` assigned to a parameter of type `string | null`.
Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: Unsafe assignment of an `any` value.
Unsafe member access .params on an `any` value.
Promises must be awaited, end with a call to .catch, end with a call to .then with a rejection handler or be explicitly marked as ignored with the `void` operator.
